headline: Southern Company Ranked As the No. 1 Employer in the US on 2025 Military Times Best for Vets: Employers List
summary: NORTHAMPTON, MA / ACCESS Newswire / December 16, 2025 / Southern Company Southern Company Southern Company is proud to announce the company has earned the No. 1 ranking in the United States on this year's Military Times Best for Vets: Employers list. ...

headline: DevvStream, Southern Energy, and XCF Global Announce Plan to Pursue Strategic Collaboration to Build Integrated Low-Carbon Fuels Platform and Advance Multi-Pathway SAF Strategy
summary: SACRAMENTO, Calif., December 16, 2025--DevvStream Corp. (Nasdaq: DEVS) ("DevvStream"), Southern Energy Renewables Inc. ("Southern"), and XCF Global, Inc. ("XCF") (Nasdaq: SAFX) today announced a non-binding tripartite memorandum of understanding ("MOU") to jointly explore the potential development of a next-generation low-carbon fuels platform designed to accelerate sustainable aviation fuel ("SAF") adoption, expand domestic capacity, and integrate environmental-attribute monetization into a uni

headline: Top-Ranked Utility ETFs Poised to Benefit From Recent Fed Rate Cut
summary: A third Fed rate cut this year is boosting utilities, making diversified Utility ETFs like XLU an attractive way to tap lower borrowing costs and steady dividends.

headline: IDU: Utilities Dashboard For December
summary: Water utilities are undervalued by 18% vs. 11-year averages, while electricity/multi-utilities and gas utilities are slightly overvalued. Learn more about IDU here.
